attributes.action: Hold The Directors of Facebook  accountable for what is posted on there pages
attributes.background: Sick and tired of people glorifying torture and death of people and animals on Facebook, Facebook was originally formed to connect long lost friends, it's got out of hand and is encouraging sick people to post sick videos and photos for all to see, wannabe famous sick people, this needs to stop

rejection.details: This is a matter for Facebook, not the UK Government or Parliament.
